bug.author: dance-ing
bug.summary: AssertionError:Model accepts 80 classes labeled from 0 - 79, however you labeled a class 85
bug.description: The datasets is coco2017, and my environment is Ubuntu + RTX2080ti, when I run the train.py, in the first epoch, the error was happended in utils.utils.py line376, I don't konw why ??? Are there any other file parameters I need to change??

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dance-ing>@dance-ing</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
Your dataset is incorrect. You can download coco 2017 by following instructions in wiki tutorial.
I have tried this program on voc2007 and that's right!
The author's model has been used for a long time, and no one has ever encountered this problem, only you, you should be a step wrong
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
